name: YELLOW BUS
description:
Arcade game just for fun

  • Collect passengers up to 20 
  • Let passengers left the bus on bus stops
  • Avoid crazy drivers
  • Pass other cars to collect score

Game Controllers

               Up

Speed: Bus is automatically speeds up

             

           Down

Brake : Press back of the Bus to break. If you brake too often Opponent Red Bus comes and picks up your passengers

LeftRight

Change Lane : Press on the Lane on the left or right of the  Bus

Please share your comments. Enjoy and thank you!
